entity.name: Bill de Blasio
entity.description: Mayor of New York City Bill de Blasio

text: @NYCMayor Wow. Given NYC Mayor de Blasio’s early March tweet encouraging people to “get out on the town” despite the coronavirus, you’d think he would be a little more careful about what he writes. I guess he doesn’t want Pres. Trump hogging all the gaffes.
